article_title: What To Expect If Hobby Lobby Wins Religious Freedom Case

article_metadata.description: This week, the Supreme Court will decide whether craft chain Hobby Lobby has religious rights in its fight against Obamacare. But there's far more at stake in this case than the rights of women workers to contraception access, according to experts.
article_metadata.author: Clare O'Connor

og.description: This week, the Supreme Court will decide whether craft chain Hobby Lobby has religious rights in its fight against Obamacare. But there's far more at stake in this case than the rights of women workers to contraception access, according to experts.
